coreAttributes.name: joggers
coreAttributes.description: A pair of joggers made from of a blend of stretchy material and cotton fabric, perfectly appropriate for lounging or going for a morning-run.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the joggers, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the joggers, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the joggers, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] joggers, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] joggers, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] joggers, before yanking them off.
